title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a flea in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Fleas are considered one of the very annoying types of insects that stand on the skin and work to suck human blood. They are infected insects and are found in garbage places and on the bodies of animals in the streets, but when they are seen in a dream, what is its meaning and interpretation? In some cases, fleas in a dream are an ominous sign. On stress and problems, while in other cases, dreaming of fleas can mean an enemy of the dream owner or a group of bad traits that the dreamer carries. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a flea in a dream: Dreaming of fleas in a dream expresses that the dreamer carries many bad and annoying traits. When a person sees If a flea is squeezing him in a dream, this indicates that money and kindness will come to the person with insight. Some flea dreams indicate the presence of fears and problems in the dreamer’s life, while others express the permanence of goodness, and this interpretation varies depending on the dream writer. When a person sees blood in a dream Coming out abundantly from the body of fleas, this blood represents money and good things coming to the dreamer. Fleas in a dream for one girl. A girl seeing one flea in her dream may indicate the presence of a weak character in her life who is connected to her in a relationship. The girl may see biting fleas during sleep and this is evidence of That there is a group of people who enjoy betrayal and infidelity in a girl’s life and they confirm this in one way or another. Interpretation of a married woman who sees fleas in a dream When a married woman sees fleas in her dream, this expresses the presence of problems and disagreements between her and her husband and turmoil in their relationship. Sometimes a flea is in a married woman’s dreams An expression of illicit money and hostility between a woman and her husband. When a woman kills fleas in her dream, this means that she will get rid of the problems and misfortunes that befell her. Flea bites for a married woman who saw a dream indicate that she will become anxious. Interpretation of a dream about a flea for a pregnant woman. Seeing fleas in a dream is evidence of The presence of a pregnant woman, and this indicates the conspiracies and misfortunes that she is going through. Fleas in a dream indicate the problems that a pregnant woman faces during childbirth. Fleas in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate difficulty in childbirth and the exposure of the fetus to danger. Interpretation of a dream about a flea for a man: Seeing a man in a dream is like a large group of A flea is a sign of illicit money. The presence of a flea in a sick person’s dream can indicate death. A flea indicates a man with a weak character. A flea in a dream can be a sign of worry and worry. A flea can be evidence of illicit money that the viewer receives. From an evil person. Interpretation of a dream about a flea and killing it. Al-Nabulsi said that seeing a flea and killing it in a dream is evidence of many difficulties and obstacles in the dreamer’s life. Seeing fleas in a dream is one of the visions that indicate unhappy things as well as hearing bad news.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the sound of a crow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the sound of a crow in a dream. We will learn about the interpretation of a dream about the sound of a crow in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and not personal interpretations and the meanings it carries in reality. Interpretation of a dream about the sound of a crow in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the sound of a crow in a dream could be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. A married man’s vision of the sound of a crow can also indicate bad news, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees the sound of a crow, it may lead to sadness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a crow. Loud in a dream, this may be evidence of the loss of a person, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about crown eggs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about crown eggs in a dream can indicate children who do not respect their parents, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees crown eggs, this may indicate children. Arrogant people who cause her anxiety and sadness, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Likewise, if a married man sees crow eggs in a dream, this may mean that he will have many children, God willing, as it may indicate a large number of offspring, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of duck eggs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of duck eggs in a dream: Fulfillment of desires and God is higher and more enlightened. When a pregnant woman sees duck eggs, this may indicate that she will give birth to a male, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees duck eggs, it can express freedom from problems and payment of debts, God willing. In the event that a married woman sees duck eggs in a dream This may be evidence of paying off debts, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams about ducks attacking me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about ducks attacking me in a dream could be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. But if the dreamer sees ducks attacking him in a dream, it may be an indication of worries and sorrows, and God knows the unseen. When you see An unmarried girl who is attacked by a duck may feel anxious because of the blame, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a duck attacking him, this may be evidence of trouble, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about feeding ducks in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about feeding ducks in a dream could be a sign that things are becoming easier, God knows best. I know: When a married woman sees feeding ducks in a dream, this could be evidence of kindness, and God knows the unseen. In the case of watching an unmarried girl eating ducks, this could be a sign of goodness and care, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing ducks being fed can also express the good qualities of the dreamer and God. I know the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about buying ducks in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying ducks in a dream could be a sign of moving to a new home, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees himself in a dream buying ducks, it may be an indication of marriage, and God knows best. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees Dream interpretation

title: Interpretation of buying new clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Buying new clothes in a dream is one of the desired dreams for both women and men. Each of us loves to shop and buy new clothes of various shapes and colors, and seeing them in a dream fulfills the dreamer’s satisfaction and makes him feel happy. Seeing it in a dream. Buying new clothes in a dream. Dreaming that you are buying white clothes in a dream indicates an improved situation and a sign of the dreamer’s piety and religious and moral commitment. Seeing the same person buying new clothes in a dream is one of the dreams that symbolizes the relationship of an unmarried young man or unmarried girl. A person who sees himself buying new, expensive clothes in a dream is a dream that shows the fortuneteller’s position in society and an indication of achieving a prestigious position. A sick woman who sees herself in a dream buying new clothes is a sign of recovering soon. Buying new clothes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. To dream That you are buying new formal clothes indicates that the dreamer will achieve excellence and success in various aspects of his life. Whoever sees that he is buying new clothes in a dream is a dream that symbolizes the improvement of circumstances and the emergence of many good things for him in life. He dreams that he is buying colorful clothes in a dream that symbolizes purity. The heart and life are in a state of joy and peace of mind. When the dreamer sees himself in a dream while buying new clothes, this is a sign that he will be able to obtain a prestigious professional opportunity. Buying new clothes in a dream for a single woman. When a girl sees herself buying new clothes in a dream, this is an indication On the dreamer's effort to complete her wedding, and if her fiancé is the one who bought these clothes, this is a sign that he lives happily if the clothes are also beautiful, or cancels the engagement if her clothes are ugly. The dreamer who lives in a state of anxiety and sadness, if she sees in her dream that she is buying clothes New, this is a sign of some positive changes for the better, and a sign of salvation from problems. A girl who sees in her dream a man she knows and buys her new clothes from the dream, which symbolizes that person’s love for her and his desire to communicate with her, and God knows best. In the case of a dream about buying new clothes, circumstances will improve. The dreamer for the better and many transformations in her personality and morals for the better. Buying new black clothes in a dream for a single woman. A girl who has never been married before, if she sees in her dream that she is buying dark clothes, this is a sign that she heard some unpleasant news, such as the death of someone close to her and beloved to her. Seeing a virgin girl buying black clothes in a dream symbolizes that she has committed many immoralities and sins and needs to repent and return to God. A girl, if she sees in her dream that she is buying black clothes in a dream, is one of the dreams that indicates that she will fall into many trials. Buying new clothes in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the same woman in a dream buying new clothes is one of the dreams, meaning livelihood and the appearance of good deeds. The dreamer who sees herself in a dream wearing new clothes is one of the dreams that indicates that she is living in a state of marital happiness and is an indication of...

title: Baldness in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the great translators

preview.html: Baldness in a dreamBaldness or alopecia is the loss of hair from the scalp or the entire body, and it can be due to external factors or heredity, and the most vulnerable people at this time are men, and when the dreamer sees in his dream that he has become bald, we will certainly be surprised by it, and it may worry us, and he will have a desire to... Knowing its interpretation if it is good or bad, so in this article we examine the most important things that the jurists said, so follow us...! Baldness in dreams. Interpreters say that feeling bald in a dream means losing a lot of money and bankruptcy in her life. If a merchant sees in his dream that he is bald And his hair is falling out, this symbolizes fear and extreme anxiety at that time. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is suffering from baldness, he will face great financial difficulties and great money losses. Seeing baldness in the dream symbolizes the scandals that will be revealed. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she She suffers from severe baldness, as this indicates failure and failure to achieve her goal. Also, seeing baldness in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes ignorance and not acquiring much knowledge. If a female student sees in her dream that she is severely bald on her head, it indicates her failure and failure in her work and life. Academy. Baldness in a dream by Ibn Sirin The respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the dreamer bald and his hair falling out in a dream means losing money and suffering from extreme poverty. Also, seeing the dreamer bald with her head in a dream symbolizes the great failure that she will experience and failure in her life. If the dreamer suddenly sees his head bald In a dream, it indicates major calamities and misfortunes that he will be exposed to in the coming days. Seeing severe baldness on the dreamer’s head indicates weakness, lack of resourcefulness, and inability to achieve his goal. If an unmarried girl dreams that she will be bald on her head, this symbolizes scandal and revelation. Its secrets. Seeing a married woman in her dream suffering from hair loss and baldness, which leads to extreme poverty and difficulties in life. If the dreamer works in a certain job and sees in his dream that he has become bald, this symbolizes the loss of his position and lack of money. To see the dreamer suffering from baldness in If an unmarried girl sees her hair falling out and going bald in her dream, this will lead to severe fear in her life and she will suffer from constant anxiety. And if the insight in a dream sees her baldness and crying intensely because of it, This symbolizes the bad psychological state that she is going through at that time. As for the testimony of baldness, in the girl’s opinion, it indicates the heavy losses in her life and the great suffering from it. If the dreamer sees baldness in his dream, this indicates her relationship with someone who does not suit her. Seeing baldness in a girl’s dream For an unmarried woman, it indicates the loss of someone close to her and his serious suffering. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is bald and her hair is falling out a lot, this indicates the disasters and problems that she will face. Also, if the dreamer sees in her dream that she is suffering from baldness and does not find a cure, it means that she has fallen into many disputes and was unable to Fix it. What is it?

title: Interpretation of seeing raw meat in a dream

preview.html: In this article from Mufsir, the largest dream interpretation website in the world, we will correct some misconceptions about the interpretation of seeing raw meat or seeing yourself eating it. Interpretation of seeing raw meat in a dream for a single girl: Seeing cutting raw meat in a dream for an unmarried girl is a bad dream, it means that she She will stop being in her condition for a long time. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her lover or relative is giving her raw meat, the vision indicates that they will fall together into calamity. But if a girl sees that she is taking raw meat from her friend, this indicates that friend’s deception to trap her in Problems. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is cooking raw meat, and in reality she is engaged or engaged to a young man. The vision shows that she does not truly love this young man despite his love for her, but she is with him only because she benefits from him financially. A girl seeing raw meat may indicate that there is Someone in her life does not love her, but rather manipulates her feelings or takes advantage of her. If a girl sees herself eating raw meat, this indicates her feeling of sadness and depression due to constant failure in life. Raw meat in a girl’s dream could be a sign of a sudden difference in her lifestyle that she is not accustomed to, And God knows best. Seeing raw meat in a girl’s dream symbolizes a disgraceful act committed by the monarch or bad talk about someone who reached him. Raw meat in an unmarried woman’s dream is a symbol of the difficulties she will face when she wants to achieve her dreams. See also: Distributing raw meat in a dream Unmarried women, pregnant women, and divorced women should interpret the vision of raw meat in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees raw meat in a dream, this indicates a near future approaching, such as a husband, father, or mother. A dream about raw meat in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will be exposed to words that degrade her and harass her. From her husband or his relatives. Also, raw meat symbolizes that the dreamer or someone close to her will be exposed to illness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a married woman cutting raw meat symbolizes a serious lack of money or hearing bad news. If a woman eats raw meat in a dream, This indicates the presence of marital problems, personal violence, and humiliation from her husband. But if a woman is seen distributing raw meat to people in the street, this is a sign of charitable work. Seeing cutting raw meat in a married woman’s dream may mean that she is thinking about divorcing her husband. And the woman who sees that she She eats from her living body. It turns out that she is an adulteress, and it is a warning from God. If a married woman sees that she went to the market to buy fresh meat, this indicates kindness and nourishment. If the butcher has blood on his clothes, this indicates a dispute between her and her husband or relatives. Interpretation of a vision Raw meat in a dream about a man and its meaning Cutting raw meat into small pieces in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams and legitimate gains, and God knows best. But if a man sees in a dream that he is cutting raw meat into slices, this symbolizes getting rid of the feeling of sadness. If a man sees some evil

title: Interpretation of colored pigeons in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of colored pigeons in a dream for a single married, pregnant or divorced girl, for a single young man and a married man, whether the white dove is small, seeing black pigeon chicks by Ibn Sirin al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq and others. The house of the moon in a dream symbolizes many meanings and interpretations. It symbolizes calm, tranquility, acceptance and peace. Enlightenment in life, and the dream is a good sign. Interpretation of colored doves in a dream: A colored dove in a dream indicates joys and happy occasions. It is good news for an unmarried woman to meet someone she loves, and for a married woman it is a sign of affection and love. A colored dove in a pregnant woman's dream symbolizes the birth of twins. As for its eggs, feathers, young ones, its voice, and its nests, they are all signs of joy, happiness, and contentment. The merchant has profit, the student succeeds, the young man has work or travel, and the free man has peace and stability. Since the dove brings a lot of good news or that you will make good friends, the dove in a dream is associated with calm, contentment and good health. Interpretation of doves in a dream If you see two doves in a dream, this indicates a positive dream that portends Have a good emotional relationship with your life partner. Seeing pigeons with other birds in the sky indicates the need to focus on emotional relationships. If you see an unhappy pigeon in a dream, it means that there are fake friends around you and you should reconsider this point. Pigeons in a dream It denotes love, comfort and ambition. A pigeon in a dream indicates that you need to take an important step in your career. Or your love life. A pigeon in a dream indicates a happy marriage, and if a pigeon flies, it means that you will have the right to choose what you like when you get married. A pigeon that sits on your hand in a dream indicates the presence of absolute trust. title: Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, seeing magic in a dream is one of the terrifying dreams that disturb the sleep of everyone who sees it and makes him afraid and panic as soon as he sees it, because magic is one of the acts that carries a lot of evil and is done in secret through spells. The magician puts it on something related to magic and all of them are based on polytheism to the gods, so in this article today you will learn together about the interpretation of seeing magic in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen.Interpretation of a dream of seeing magic in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees magic in His dream, this is evidence that the place where the dreamer lives is full of poverty, disease, and ignorance, and it is not an appropriate environment for him to live in. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is a magician, this means that the dreamer has committed many sins and disobedience, and he must repent and return to God. And God knows best. But if the dreamer sees himself working with magic in his dream, this is evidence that the dreamer is gambling and doing what God has forbidden, and his sins are many, and he is far from the path of God, may God protect us. Interpretation of a dream about seeing buried magic extracted from the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Whoever saw it in his dream That he brings out magic buried in the ground, this indicates that the fortuneteller will obtain a lot of money, but this money is forbidden because it does not come from a legal and legal source, and in his vision it was so. An indication that the fortuneteller is spreading discord among the common people around him and is still following sedition and heresy, God forbid. As for the one who sees himself resisting magic in his dream, this indicates that he is one of the personalities distinguished by wisdom in all his actions, and God is the Most High. But if a man walks in a dream with... A magician and following him, this indicates that the magician is doing forbidden things and committing forbidden things and has committed a lot of sin and disobedience, God forbid. Interpretation of the dream of seeing magic in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen believes that if the dreamer sees in his dream that he found magic and deciphered its symbols, this is a sign of alleviating his pain and getting rid of it. Of the problems that surround him. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he fell into the hands of a group of magicians and they controlled him and fell under their influence, then this indicates that there is a great danger that the dreamer is trying to be careful. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he himself dispels the magic from Another enchanted person, then this is evidence of the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty. But if the dreamer sees in the dream that a group of people are performing magic rituals, then this is an indication of abundant goodness that will come to the dreamer in his life and that his life will change for the better by God’s command. Interpretation of the dream of seeing magic in a dream For a single woman, if she sees in her dream an unmarried girl who has not yet married a witch, this indicates the dreamer’s naivety and that she rarely uses her mind and that she prefers to use her heart and control it in most matters. But if the unmarried girl sees the same witch in her dream, this indicates that in her life A person with bad morals and a liar, and there is no hope for his justice. Interpretation of a dream about seeing magic in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees magic in her dream, this is an indication that there is a person in her dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bicycle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a cyclist in a dream. Many people try to maintain their weight and want not to increase it, because it plays an important role in maintaining their health, and obesity causes many diseases in people, including blood pressure and diabetes, and there are sports devices that help The body helps in losing weight and burning harmful fats, and many people prefer to eat them at home and not go to clubs and gyms, as they are stable devices and easy to carry in homes, so what is the explanation for this? Dreaming of seeing a bicycle rider in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of riding a bicycle in a dream for a man: This dream shows the speed of a person in achieving his dreams and achieving his goals. It is also an indicator of the stability in which this person lives. We will provide you with the most important dreams related to this dream: A man quickly earns a lot of money and a lot of living when he sees in his dream that he is riding a bicycle. He can also reach his dreams and goals that he seeks to achieve. It is also a sign of salvation from a misfortune or evil that may happen to him. In addition In addition, a man has a high status and enjoys great prestige among members of society. Moreover, he can control his life, including his interests, and make it compatible with his interests and benefits. He also ends the problems and hardships that he suffered and lives his life with stability. It also finds him A job in an upscale place that he was trying to find. Moreover, his life changes and improves for the better. See also: Interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream and its effects. Interpretation of a dream about riding a bike in a dream for a single woman. This dream is interpreted because this girl thinks calmly and can control her emotional affairs as well as her life And that she will communicate with someone who matches her thinking, and these are the interpretations related to this dream: This dream is considered a dream if this girl is accustomed to riding a bike all the time. It also removes the problems and difficulties that she has been facing, especially recently. She will also break off her engagement to her fiancé when She dreams that she is riding a distorted bicycle. In addition, he is experiencing a period of stability and prosperity if he is riding a pink bicycle and walking on a bumpy road. But if it is red, then she loves a young man whom she wants to be associated with for a long time. In addition, she will face problems at work when she sees her falling In a dream. Moreover, she will live her life full of optimism and happiness and hear the news that makes her happy and joyful. You can also get rid of the problems that fall upon her easily, and continue her life steadily. She will also get a new job, or get a promotion at her job. See also: Interpretation Seeing peace in a dream and its effects Seeing a cyclist in a dream Al-Osaimi The person who sees this vision will be able to succeed in his academic and professional life, and it is also a sign of the person withdrawing from the sins he was committing and getting closer to God: A person can make a lot of profits and earn more money in his trade. He also obtains a high and recognized position in one of the jobs in his country. Moreover, T

title: Interpretation of seeing kiwi in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating kiwi in her dream, this vision indicates that she will soon marry a good young man, God willing. Seeing a married woman eating kiwi fruit from her husband’s hand in a dream, this symbolizes the end of marital problems and disputes. Then if a pregnant woman sees if the kiwi turns into Black color in a dream, it means that the dreamer will face a serious financial crisis. Seeing buying kiwi symbolizes that the dreamer will face serious problems in his workplace, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing kiwi in one dream: Seeing a free girl eating kiwi in a dream indicates that she will achieve great success in her life, and God knows best. It can symbolize seeing a kiwi. In one dream, she will soon marry a good man who will make her happy for the rest of her life. If a girl sees that kiwi tastes delicious in a dream, then this dream is good and means that she will connect with the person she loves. So, seeing a single girl eating kiwi in a dream It means that she will find a new job soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing eating kiwi in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating kiwi, this means that she will achieve the goals that she seeks to achieve. But if she sees that her husband was feeding her kiwi in a dream, then this The dream symbolizes the cessation of worries and sorrows. Then seeing a holder of anemones in a dream means an easy, natural and safe birth for her and her new child, God willing. It can symbolize seeing a kiwi. In the dreamer’s dream, his health improves and he will recover soon by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a kiwi farmer in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing Kiwi in a dream symbolizes sustenance, goodness, blessing, and long life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Then seeing planting kiwi in the dream indicates that the dreamer will change his life for the better during the coming period, God willing. It indicates the vision of eating rotten kiwi. In the dreamer’s dream, the dreamer is exposed to a great loss and may be exposed to poverty, and God knows best. Then Seeing an unmarried woman eating kiwi fruit in her dream indicates that she will reach a great position in the near future, God willing. Interpretation of seeing kiwi and apples for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman kiwi in a dream indicates the loss of worries, sorrows, and problems that the dreamer is suffering from. It could indicate This vision also in the dream of a young pregnant woman indicates that she will achieve all of her goals that she seeks to achieve. But if she sees that she ate a kiwi in her dream, it means that she is in good health and will live a happy life. Then watch the pregnant woman buy a kiwi in the dream. Her due date and the birth of the fetus are approaching, with permission. God. Buying and selling kiwi in a dream for a man. If one sees in a dream that he is buying kiwi fruit, this means that he will be blessed with great prosperity, abundant money and abundant livelihood. Then see eating kiwi in the dream indicates the fulfillment of hopes, dreams and ambitions that could not be achieved in the past. But if he sees it As he distributes kiwi fruit to his relatives, this dream is good and means that he will get a promotion at work. Eating a small piece of kiwi in a dream means that he will get a promotion at work.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about drowning a relative of Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a relative drowning carries many connotations and meanings for dreamers and makes them desperate to know them, and in the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations on this topic, so let's read more. Interpretation of a dream of a relative drowning The dreamer's vision of a relative drowning indicates that he will lose a lot of his money as a result of the many disturbances that his work will face and he will not deal with them well. If he sees one of his relatives drowning in his dream, this is a sign of the many problems he suffers from that prevent him from feeling comfortable. If the dreamer sees his relative drowning during his sleep, this means that he is doing many ugly things and must be stopped immediately before they cause his death. Seeing the dreamer in a dream drowning a relative symbolizes the need to be careful in the coming days, as he may be exposed to things that are not good at all. Interpretation of a dream of a relative drowning by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer's dream of a relative drowning as an indication of the abundant good that he will enjoy in his life in the coming days. If a person sees in his dream that his relative is drowning and he is actually sick, this is a sign of his very poor health and he may die in a short time from this dream. In the event that he sees The dreamer during his sleep drowning a dead relative, this expresses the severe torment he is exposed to as a result of not doing a good job in this world. Watching the dreamer in a dream about the drowning of one of his relatives indicates that he will fall into a major crisis in the coming days, which he will not be able to overcome easily. Interpretation of a dream of a relative drowning for a single woman Seeing unmarried women in a dream drowning one of their relatives means that they neglect their studies a lot and this will lead to their failure in their exams at the end of the school year. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that one of his relatives has drowned, this is a sign that he will not be able to achieve his goals due to the many obstacles that prevent him from doing so. If the dreamer sees in her dream the drowning of a relative and her success in saving him, this indicates the progress of a young man who loves to marry her and she will be very happy about that. The girl who sees a relative drowning in her dream symbolizes that she will face a big problem as a result of her reckless behavior. Interpretation of a dream of a relative drowning for a married woman Seeing a married woman drowning her relative in a dream means that she suffers from many problems in her life and this prevents her from feeling satisfied in her life. If a woman sees one of her relatives Drowning in her dream, this is a sign that her family and home are busy with many unnecessary matters and she must stop that immediately. If the fortune teller sees during her sleep that one of her relatives is drowning, this expresses the many differences prevailing in her relationship with her husband, which makes her ready to divorce him. Watching the dreamer in her dream saving a relative from drowning symbolizes that she has overcome many of the difficult times that she was going through in her life. Interpretation of a dream of a relative drowning for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman drowning one of her relatives in a dream indicates that she is going through a very difficult pregnancy period, during which she suffers a lot of pain and difficulties. If a woman sees in
